abstract.p: Correction of September 10 classical music listing in New Season issue which misstated phone numbers for Tallis Scholars concert and Merkin Concert Hall as well as title of Museum of Modern Art drawings chief curator and paintings and sculpture curator Gary Garrels (S)

block.p: A classical music listing in the New Season issue last Sunday misstated the phone number for a concert by the Tallis Scholars at the Church of St. Ignatius Loyola in Manhattan on Dec. 7. It is (800) 627-0655.
An entry in the ''Places'' section for classical music misstated the telephone number for Merkin Concert Hall in Manhattan. It is (212) 501-3330.

The ''Looking Ahead'' symposium for art misstated the title of a contributor, Gary Garrels, at the Museum of Modern Art. He is chief curator, department of drawings, and a curator of painting and sculpture -- not chief curator, department of prints and drawings.
